DOC.brief_summary: The present study will explore the effectiveness of a computer based neurobehavioral intervention in improving cognition and emotion regulation in a college freshmen population. It will increase understanding of emotion-regulation and cognition at a neural-circuit level and aid development of new interventions for emotion regulatory problems.
DOC.brief_title: Computerized Interventions for College Students' Cognitive Functioning and Mental Well-being
DOC.criteria: internet access lifetime psychotic disorder, pastyear substance dependence
